name: Library Lore
description:
Game Controls

  • Move your character using WASD keys or the arrow keys
  • Look around using your mouse
  • Press SPACE to jump
  • Press CTRL to crouch

This is a quick and simple game to familiarize you with some of the restrictions of game writing. To change the text of this game, click the "Edit Game" button on the main menu.

The master spreadsheet for each text variable can be found here. Use this sheet to guide your edits and assign the correct text to the correct field.
